ModMetaData.name: 1-2-3 Personalities M2
ModMetaData.author: Hahkethomemah
ModMetaData.description:
Second part of the Personalities series. This one is focused on simple, intuitive mechanics tailored around pawns acting in similar or different way.
This mod is develped further thanks to the community support. Special thanks are due to: - Bohdan Kim - finn - Mister Doge - Pastel Stuffie - all anononymous funders - Patreon supporters, whose ongoing help helps to plan ahead
